metadata.title: SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and now the 2019-novel CoV: Have we investigated enough about coronaviruses? – A bibliometric analysis
metadata.author: D. Katterine Bonilla-Aldana, Keidenis Quintero-Rada, Juan Pablo Montoya-Posada, Sebastian Ramírez-Ocampo, Alberto Paniz-Mondolfi, Ali A. Rabaan, Ranjit Sah, Alfonso J. Rodríguez-Morales

introduction: Contents were presented in part at the IV Latin American Congress of Virology and VIII Colombian Symposium of Virology, Bogota, Colombia, October 2–4, 2019, Oral Presentation.
